description: {"blocks":[{"key":"c71ei","text":"This protocol details OT-2 liquid handler integrated live-cell and endpoint viability drug activity screening on a 96-well plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"do6p5","text":"To overcome the individual shortcomings of live-cell imaging and endpoint viability, it is recommended to integrate both cell viability assessment methods in a single drug screen. This protocol is designed to evaluate drug efficacy simultaneously robustly and reproducibly across multiple cell lines through the integration of automation, live-cell imaging, and an endpoint metabolic ATP viability assay.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c0spp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3jcj5","text":"*It is recommended that this protocol be used after defining optimized assay-specific growth conditions through the application of the protocol “96-well plate cell growth optimization for integrated live-cell and endpoint viability drug screening assay” for each tested cell line.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ed4at","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"grs5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"hvop","text":"This protocol is designed to simultaneously screen a single compound across a panel of cell lines in a semi-automated procedure integrating sequential live-cell imaging and endpoint viability assays in a 72-hour drug screen. Upon successful execution of this protocol the user will have access to the following raw data:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":320}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pb03","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3vrkt","text":"Live-cell imaging to display morphological changes and response to drug treatment at 6 concentrations per cell line over a 72-hour time span.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":141}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"frs6e","text":"Endpoint cell metabolism-based viability data curves generating dose response curves for each cell line.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":104}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"sibn","text":"Untreated cell growth rates and cell viability drug response data which allows for the calculation of metrics such as IC50, AUC (area under the curve), GR50, and AOC (area over the curve).","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":188}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56us2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eicpe","text":"*Note this protocol can be adapted to accommodate user preferences, but the Opentrons OT-2 procedures included were designed to test 8 cell lines simultaneously.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
